name: Defenestratio - Student Work
description:
The early student prototype version of Defenestratio, a fast-paced first-person window-smashing game about diving through windows and getting the fastest time

This prototype was developed as part of a student work project as the Academy of Interactive Entertainment. Defenestratio was made in under 6 weeks with no prior C# programming knowledge, and only basic knowledge in navigating the Unity game engine, it was a real learning experince!
